Authors: Alfredo Vizzini, Alessia Tatti, Enrico Ercole
Title: Looking for Lepiota psalion (Agaricales, Agaricaceae)
Keywords:
Basidiomycota, Agaricomycetes, hymeniform pileus covering,
cryptic species, taxonomy
Abstract:
Lepiota psalion is here fully described based on a recent
collection from Sardinia (Italy) and the holotype. ITS- and LSU-based
phylogeny demonstrated that sequences deposited in GenBank as “L.
psalion” and generated from two Dutch and one Chinese collections are
not conspecific with the holotype and represent two distinct, not yet
described species.
